item.question: What is the meaning of HTML?
It is intended for providing accessibility.
An easily parsed structure that allows users to create their own tags.
It is commonly used as an escape sequence.
It forbids the use of deprecated elements.
HTML attribute that specifies the destination of the link
An element used to indicate an ordered list
It is used to identify the language of the document
It is strictly formatted as XML.
It allows deprecated elements for backward compatibility.
